paragraphs.body: This page allows you to upload images to Avatar Wiki. Please don't upload an image until you plan to immediately use it on at least one page.
paragraphs.text: This page allows you to upload images to Avatar Wiki. Please don't upload an image until you plan to immediately use it on at least one page.

paragraphs.body: The "Summary" section of the form further below contains a template that needs to be filled out.

paragraphs.body: When licensing a fanart image, an addition parameter artist should be added to credit the artist responsible.
